website_summaries.verdict: A quality bouncing house that can accommodate multiple kids at the same time.
pros: The dual slides really set the Yard Bounce House apart
We love that multiple kids could slide down at once
The house has a durable feel to it and can handle children up to 9 years old
We loved that this house is fully enclosed with mesh, so there was no fear of kids or balls falling out of the sides
Being roughly 7 feet tall, the house is short enough to fit indoors but still tall enough to provide a safe wall while jumping
cons: A bit on the heavy side
may require two people to put away

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncy house
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bouncy house for a birthday party last weekend. It was bigger then we expected and very bright. It inflated easily in just one minute . It is very well done with double stitching and pvc bounce floor . Overall we are very satisfied with the purchase and will definitely buy more from this company and recommend to all friends . Customer service is also very great. 5 stars .
customer_reviews.author: Karina Melik-Bagdasarova

customer_reviews.title: ** MOMS ** BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This bounce house is GREAT. Works both indor and outdoor! Perfect for little kids and exhausted moms!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for taking traveling. Perfect for 3 to 4 kids. Comes with everything you need. Fast setup.
customer_reviews.author: Drew-

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect sized sturdy bounce house
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect sized sturdy bounce house. Unfortunately it came with some leaks upon unpacking and turning it on for the first time. It came with patches and directions say "remove adhesive backing and stick on" but there is no adhesive backing on any of the patches. The instructions say packaging should include "Glue&Adhesive" and there was none.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Better than renting
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! We looked into renting a bounce house, but decided to buy this one for almost the same price. While it is smaller, I like knowing that it is clean. My son loves it and it is a great way for him to burn off energy. We used it outside in the summer, but also inflated it in our garage in the winter. The kids ranging from age 3-6 had a blast. Things got a little rowdy so my husband ziptied the side door shut so the kids wouldn't jump out on the cement floor in our garage. Several family members have commented on what a wonderful purchase this is!
customer_reviews.author: Nooby

customer_reviews.title: A ton of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids’ party was a success thanks to this bounce house - we had at least 6 kids jumping at the same time with no issue - they were ages 2-5. Great purchase. Hope it lasts us a while. Blower is very silent.
customer_reviews.author: Sebylita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying an inflatable and this one was by far the best value. There is plenty of space for my little one to jump around in and my husband and daughter love to jump in it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B.

customer_reviews.title: Over priced if you pay more than $300!
customer_reviews.text: Great value at under $300... yes, most of us paid under $300... don’t let them take advantage of you! We love this thing. It gets a ton of use in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: grandkids love it. we have it for a year now, every family gathering it gets used. strong, durable.Even my 9 yr old still gets in there, they wrestle quite a bit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: that it is a bad almost one use product that is not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: the first day we were able to inflate it . it was very unstable item. it seems like it was going to leave the floor
customer_reviews.author: Loulou

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and a great size! Kids love that they can race each other with the double slide!
customer_reviews.author: Georgiapeach2018

customer_reviews.title: All day fun
customer_reviews.text: Omg the kids loved jumping in this for my sons’s birthday bash
customer_reviews.author: Sapphiresky

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! I really like how it is small enough to inflate in the garage and yet very durable for bigger kids too! As of now I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for backyards
customer_reviews.text: Its a great addition to our back yard, our grandkids just love it. It so easy to blowuo and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Inflates in seconds! Great fun to have in the yard
customer_reviews.author: It's all me

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it. We'd bought one from a different manufacturer ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it. We'd bought one from a different manufacturer a couple months before and the pump only lasted for 10 minutes. This one worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A Deatherage

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Product came with a leak as soon as we opened it. Unfortunately we have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect and easy to setup, the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: tinna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this and it was a lot better that expected.
customer_reviews.author: l.guynn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids enjoyed it. But it was much smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: LOU

customer_reviews.title: I live how easy it is to assemble and take down in just ...
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves her bounce house. I love how easy it is to assemble and take down in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: To small for the price. It's just as snap as the one I had already. Not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Zdenka Cribb

customer_reviews.title: A lot if fun for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for the grandkids. Set it up for a family party.
customer_reviews.author: nah

customer_reviews.title: Shelter in place lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has gotten so much use of this bounce house. Best quarantine investment
customer_reviews.author: Jenn P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little skeptic
customer_reviews.text: Over all a nice product but a little skeptical of the quality. There are already lose/fraying threads on the stitching. My kids 3,4,6 are well under the 100lb per jumper weight limit ( they weigh about 120 combined). It came with a patch kit but I don’t believe that would really work. It was only been inside my living room and free of all sharp objects. I’m really hoping I don’t regret this purchase but I’m not feeling comfortable about it now.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Masiello

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for young kids!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so much fun for our 2 and 6 year old kids to play on inside and out (in dry days). Very durable and easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Coffrin

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this! Perfect for my son’s quarantined 3rd birthday💙
customer_reviews.author: Anon2

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids LOVE IT. we use it often. Easy to set up. It does take two people to fold it tight
customer_reviews.author: E Amato

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our kids during Covid -19 isolation. It was a great way for them to get some exercise and fresh air. Well built and designed.
customer_reviews.author: TO

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it..
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for my 8yr old and my 5yr old. It's very durable. My husband or I will also jump in there and play . I set it up indoors!!
customer_reviews.author: John Correa

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. Our kids love it. We set it up outside, in our garage, or even in our living room on rainy days. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bday gift
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up.. very durable and my son loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vandermay

customer_reviews.title: Great designs and staff!
customer_reviews.text: Great staff at this company! They are very friendly. They have very fun designs and what seems to be a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Cody lee Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product & very GREAT staff, very friendly. I would highly recommend this company to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: kiatanna lawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, very good material - highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Johannes Posojewitsch

product_meta.title: YARD Bounce House Dual Slide w/Heavy Duty Blower Indoor Outdoor Moonwalk Inflatable Bouncer Made of Nylon and Vinyl Extra Thick Bouncing Floor
feature_bullets: YARD BOUNCE HOUSE DUAL SLIDE 6008: measures 12.1' length, 8.5' width and 6.9' height, and has a capacity of 4 children (maximum 100 pounds each, 400 pounds total). Suitable for OUTDOOR and INDOOR, ideal for almost anywhere in or around house, in backyard or living room, for a birthday party, Christmas party, family reunion, or for any occasion to keep the kids entertained as they bounce around in the moonwalk.

SAFETY FOR KIDS: 6008 bouncy castle designed with safety features and comply with manufacturing laws. Stakes anchor the bouncer firmly in ground. Mesh net protect children, your kids will bounce freely while you take comfort knowing they're well protected by safety netting. YARD bring happiness to every family.

HIGH QUALITY & EXTRA THICK JUMPING SLIDING AREA & CPSC CERTIFIED: YARD 6008 bounce house made of high quality material with highest standard to ensure the kids safety. Durable sewing and extra thick jumping and sliding area is constructed from the highest quality materials to ensure it's strong and sturdy. Also approved with Children Product Certificate and has satisfied CPSC tests. Comes with a 450W heavy-duty blower meets US standard.

EASY SET UP & TAKE DOWN : 6008 jump house comes with blower, repair sheet, stakes and carrying bag. Easy to use and carry. It takes less than 2 minutes to inflate. And also easy to take it down, just turn off the blower and let it deflates on its own and store it to the carrying bag.

YARD goal is for our customers to be completely satisfied with every transaction. We stand behind all of our products 100%. If there are any problems please feel free to contact us to rectify the problem right away.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars55 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
